list_definition.definition: something (eg a table in a restaurant) which has been reserved

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Do you have a reservation, Sir?
He has some reservations about the new legislation.

list_definition.mean_english: vùng đất dành cho một mục đích nhất định
list_definition.definition: a piece of land set aside for a particular purpose

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: an Indian reservation in the United States.

list_ex_of_english: The agitation was used to demand abolition of reservations altogether.
